films.title: Paddington in Peru
films.plot: Paddington travels to Peru, the country of his origins, where he embarks on a fun-filled adventure while trying to find a special gift for his Aunt Lucyâ€™s birthday.

films.title: The Amateur
films.plot: A young journalist discovers a conspiracy while investigating a political scandal and becomes caught in a web of intrigue and danger.

films.title: A Minecraft Movie
films.plot: A group of explorers is sucked into the blocky world of Minecraft, where they must navigate dangerous mobs, build incredible structures, and defeat the powerful Ender Dragon to escape. Directed by Jared Hess, the film blends adventure, humor, and creativity in a pixelated universe.

films.title: Ballerina
films.plot: A former ballerina embarks on a mission of revenge against those who wronged her, leading to an action-packed journey of mystery and suspense.

films.title: Warfare
films.plot: A group of soldiers are sent on a high-stakes mission during a global conflict, but the chaos of war pushes them to their limits, testing their survival instincts and loyalty.

films.title: Mickey 17
films.plot: A group of colonists on a distant planet must rely on a man whose mind is constantly reset, leading to questions of identity, humanity, and survival in the vast unknown.

films.title: Snow White
films.plot: A reimagining of the classic Snow White tale, where Snow White must overcome obstacles and discover her inner strength with the help of seven magical dwarfs.

films.title: Black Bag
films.plot: A mysterious black bag contains a secret that threatens to unravel the lives of three individuals as they get caught in a high-stakes game of deception and survival.

films.title: Sinners
films.plot: A group of detectives investigates a series of gruesome crimes tied to the seven deadly sins. As they delve deeper into the case, they uncover a horrifying truth that challenges their morality.

films.title: Mission Impossible: The Final Reckoning
films.plot: Ethan Hunt faces his toughest mission yet as he races against time to prevent a global catastrophe while dealing with personal loss and betrayal.
